ComicInfo.Penciller: Chris Alexander,Keith Giffen,Eric Stephenson,Keith Giffen,Eric Stephenson,Chris Alexander
ComicInfo.Summary: Inside Project: Born Again: Having literally been torn apart by Supreme, the members of Bloodstrike are gathered up by Project Born Again who begins to put the pieces back together again. Cabbot resists the resurrection process but is finally goaded into returning to the land of the living by violent memories of his brother, Battlestone. Since Cabbot managed to get his entire team killed on their last outing, Noble brings in Chapel (who has been kicked off of Youngblood thanks to his HIV positive status) to lead Bloodstrike.
ComicInfo.Title: Inside Project: Born Again
